WorkItem.Description:
COUNT() method in Functions.php is not initialising $returnValue correctly.
It is being re-initialised to $aArgs[0] after $aArgs = PHPExcel_Calculation_Functions::flattenArray(func_get_args())
when it should simply be initialised to 0 as it is in the first line of the function.
Â 
Attached file includes the fix, plus functions for AVERAGE and MEDIAN
Note that these latter new functions need updating in the $this->_functionMappings array in Calculation.php as well.
